FileSystemFileHandleCreateSyncAccessHand.summary:
The createSyncAccessHandle() method of the
interface returns a {{jsxref('Promise')}} which resolves to a object
that can be used to synchronously read from and write to a file. The synchronous nature of this method brings performance advantages,
but it is only usable inside dedicated Web Workers for files within the origin private file system.

remarks.para: Creating a takes an exclusive lock on the file associated with the file handle. This prevents the creation of further s or s for the file until the existing access handle is closed.

-File System Access API
-The File System Access API: simplifying access to local files
